txt.en: Deep within Wyrmsgráf, there lies a great larder which once belonged to Scatha the Worm. In recent years, it has come to be a feeding ground for the young dragon-kind of Ered Mithrin.\n\nYour mission is to defeat many of the dragon-kind dwelling in Scatha's Larder.
Once a great larder used by Scatha the Worm, a recently-discovered chasm in Wyrmsgráf now serves as the proving grounds for young dragon-kind in Elderslade.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have just returned from Wyrmsgráf. They have reason to believe that a chasm once used by Scatha is now a feeding ground for the youngest dragon-kind of Ered Mithrin. We cannot allow the like of dragons to again emerge as a threat to the North - not at so crucial a moment in the history of dwarves!

'You are to travel to Scatha's larder in Wyrmsgráf and defeat these dragon-kind before they can grow to rival their forebears! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
Some monsters in this mission will apply a flaming reflect shield to themselves.
Your mission is to defeat many of the dragon-kind dwelling in Scatha's Larder.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma and travel to Scatha's Larder.
'You have done well, [placeholder].\n\n'Let the descendants of Scatha come to fear the dwarves as they rightly should!'
